column4: So I just burned a DVD with Gnomebaker... and my DVD Player, which is supposed to support DVD-Rs... Doesn't play it... Is it something I did wrong burning or would it be my DVD Player?
I burned it at the highest setting... and that's about the only input I had.
did you just burn a video file onto a disc or something?
no... I used gnomebaker's 'burn DVD image'
